Title: Relates to requiring that a master plumber inspect a premises within twenty-four hours of a gas leak in order to reopen gas lines
Summary: Requires that, in a city of 500,000 or more, a master plumber inspect a premises within twenty-four hours of a gas leak in order to reopen gas lines following a disruption of services.
LawCode: Add ยง18-e, Gen City L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general city law, in relation to requiring that a master plumber inspect a premises within twenty-four hours of a gas leak in order to reopen gas lines
